text: Muri MetroPlus hameze neza kandi abantu ntibuzurana mugabo harazimvye gato, naho hazimbutse gusumba amatike asanzwe ya gariyamoshi z'i Europe.
Hari igihe bisaba ko wuzuza urukaratasi ku gituro c'inyamiramabi canke ukaja ku biro biraba abinjira n'abasohoka mu gihugu.
Buri gitondo, abantu bava mu bisagara bito bito mu miduka baja gukora mu bisagara binini bagaca bahura n'abandi akazi kabo kari murivyo bisagara bavuyemwo.
Nimba utamenyereye gutwara umuduga ku mabarabara y'ikirundi, uraguma urikanuye: haragwiriye imihanamo, utuyira twaga n'amakorosi agoye.
Ukwiyunguruza kwa mbere kuzwi kwari ugutambuka. Haraheze imyaka irenga imiliyoni zibiri abantu batanguye kugenda bahagaze kuva havutse Homo Erectus (bisigura umuntu ahagaze).
Ingenzi zitegekanya kuja kwihinduza igitsina mu makungu zikwiye kuraba neza ko zitwaje inkaratasi zikwije ibisabwa zizokoreshwa mu kugaruka.
Ahandi usanga abatashikiye mu buraro bw'ingenzi ari bo gusa bakenera kwiyandikisha. Kubera ko ivyo bituma itegeko ridatomoka, vyiza rero worondera amakuru kare.
Iyo mugiye ubwambere mu gihugu kiri munzira y' amajambere, - canke mu gice gishashaa c' isi - ntimusuzugure ugushobora kudahuza n'akaranga kaho.
Bagore: Birasabwa ko abagore bose bari kurugendo bavuga ko barongowe, hatitaweho ico bari imbere y'amategeko ubu.

Ingendo z'ingenzi zirazimvye, kandi zisaba ko umuntu aba amagara meza, zishobora kuba mu gihe c’ici gusa kuva muri Munyonyo gushika muri Ruhuhuma, kandi zemewe ahanini kugirwa mu gace k'umugabane kinjira mu mazi, mu mazinga yirebanga, no mu kiyaga Rosi.
Ukugendera ikibanza bishobora kuba vyiza bijanye nukuja mubwato ugana kukiyaga.
Turagusavye wibuke ko mu bisanzwe uriko utemebera ikibanza c'imva rusangi, kandi kikaba n'ikibanza gifise insiguro itagira aho igarukira ku gice kinini c'abantu kw'isi.
Shira amakenga ko mugihe muzoshika kukivuko ibintu vyose bizoba bitahuritse neza cane. Muzohura n' abandi batwara abantu mubwato kubuntu kandi bazobasangiza amakuru yabo.
Vyongeye, ufise viza ya Schengen ntukenera kuguma urondera viza ya kimwekimwe cose mu bihugu bigize ako karere ka Schengen. Bituma ukoresha umwanya muto, amahera make, ukuzuza n'inkaratasi nke.
Ibi bishobora gukorwa mumodoka isanzwe hamwe n'ugutegekanya kwiza mugabo i 4x4 irahanuwe cane kandi ibice vyinshi bishikirwa gusa na 4x4 z'uburebure buri hejuru.
Ku mabarabara ariko ibirafu canke neje, ntushobora kunyonga nk'uko ubigira kw'ikaburimbi kuko amapine adafata neza hasi.
Ama taxi ya bose ni uburyo bwihuta kandi bwisanzuye bwo gutembera mubibanza vya hafi, nka Paro (Nu 150) na Punakha (Nu 200).
Indege Twin Otter, iyari isigaye yitwa Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, yari yagerageje kwururuka ngo igwe i Kokoda hirya y'ejo, ariko vyari bimaze kwanka rimwe.
Mw'igariyamoshi ifise uburyamo, uwuyitwara arashobora kubasaba pasiporo kugira ntibirirwe barakuvyura.
Ikiraro gitegekanywa gukora k' umugaragaro muri Nyakanga 2017, igenekerezo ama posita yo kugenzura ama duwane ya berezile yitezwe kuba yaheze.
Nta shirahamwe ry'ibigo vy'indege gikwiragira amayira y'amabahari yose ukwo ari atatu mu ruhande rw'Amaja Epfo y'isi (na SkyTeam ntifata n'imwe muri izo nzira).
Ukiri muri ako karere, muri rusangi urashobora kujabuka imbibe batiriwe barasubira gusuzuma pasiporo yawe.

Nubwo ushobora kwiyumvira ko bikuzamwo gukurikira ishirahamwe ryo kwiyunguruza mukirere ukunda kugurukiramwo cane, wobwirizwa kumenya ko uturusho dutangwa tuba kenshi dutandukanye kandi amanota ahabwa ingenzi zikunda gufata ingendo ashobora kuba menshi murindi shirahamwe ryo kwiyunguruza mukirere mw'ihuriro rimwe.
Amashirahamwe y'ivyindege amwe gusa niyo azotanga impozo yo kubura uwawe, iyo nayo ikagabanya gatoya ikiguzi c'ingendo zo ku munota wanyuma ugiye ku maziko.
Abatembera barashobora guhitamwo ahantu henshi ho kugendera mu gihugu runaka canke bagatemberera agace kamwe gusa.
Abantu barakunda kuja kw'izina rya Bowen ku murango canke muri wikendi. Hari ivyo gusoza ubwato, gutembera mu misozi, amaduka, uburiro n'ibindi.

Gutembera mu ndege birashobora kuba ibintu babamwo biteye ubwoba kubantu b' imyaka yose hamwe n' imihingo yose, cane cane nkiyo batari bwigere baguruka imbere yaho canke mugihe babaye mukintu kibabaje.
Muri make, gukoresha umuduga wawe ni uburyo bwiza cane bwo gufata urugendo mw'ibarabarara, mugabo si uburyo bwiza bwo "gucumbika".
Kwiyandikisha ni ikindi gisabwa mu bijanye na viza. Mu bihugu bimwebimwe, usabwa kumenyesha abajejwe intwaro ko uba mu karere batwara, ukababwira na aderese y'aho uba.
Amayira y'amazi aca kw'isi ashobora kuba iciyumviro ciza co kugirirako uburuhuko.
Gutwaza abandi - Ntiwigere ukura ijisho ku masakoshi yawe, canecane igihe uriko ujabuka imbibe mpuzamakungu.

Aba Vikings bakoresha inzira z' ubwogero z' uburusiya kugira baje Kukiyaga Cirabura hamwe no kukiyaga ca Caspian. Ibice bimwe bimwe vyayo ma barabara nubu birashobora gukoreshwa. Suzuma impusha zidasanzwe zishobora gukenerwa, zishobora kuba zigoye kuronka.
Cane cane mumisi yanyu yambere, mwisunge kwidagadurira mumazu yakira ingenzi yisunga imico yo Muburengero kandi ameze neza, ibifungurwa hamwe n'ubufasha kugira bibafashe kumenyera akarere gashasha.
Abene gihugu ba Cuban bafise ikarata y' ugwatsi rutoto ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe barashobora kugendera Ubuserukizi bwa Ekwateri kugira barekurirwe kudakenera ivyo bisabwa.
Vyitezwe ko amatike menshi y'ivyo birori azogurwa amayapani ari hagati ya 2.500 na 130.000, amatike asanzwe akagurwa nka 7.000.
Ingenzi zigiye mu bihugu birihisha amakori menshi zirashobora rimwe na rimwe kuziganya amahera menshi, canecane ku bintu bimwebimwe nk'inzoga n'itabi.
Vyongeye, abo mufadikanije urugendo hamwe n'incuti n'abagenzi bo muhira boshima kugufasha, nubahe ikopi y'ayo mategeko n'ayo makuru afasha gutora umuntu.
Uburaya ni umugabane wokwitwa ko ari muto urimwo ibihugu vyinshi vyigenga. Mu bisanzwe, kuja mu bihugu vyinshi vyosavye kuza urasaba viza kandi bakaza barasuzuma pasiporo yawe.

Sirena ni co kirindiro conyene c'abarinzi b'ishamba gitanga uburyamo n'imfungurwa zishushe, turetse ivyo kwemerera abantu kuhashinga amahema. I La Leona, San Pedrillo, n'i Los Patos urashobora kuhashinga ihema gusa mugabo nta mfungurwa batanga.

Ingendo zirazimbutse kumigwi minini, nukuvuga nkiyo urumwe canke murikumwe n' umugenzi umwe, gerageza guhura n' abandi hama mugire umugwi wa bane canke batandatu kugira muronke igiciro ciza kumuntu umwumwe.
Mwategerezwa guhitamwo mwitonze mw'ihuriro ishirahamwe ryanyu ryo kwiyunguruza mukirere Mukunze Kugurukiramwo.
Igihugu uzojamwo kiramutse gishizwe mu bihugu birimwo ingeramizi, birashobora kugira ico bikoze kuri asiranse igukingira mu vy'amagara igihe uri ku rugendo hamwe n'iyijanye no gusivya ingendo.
Kwinjira mu muduga wawe ugafata urugendo rurerure mw'ibarabara hari ukuntu biryoshe kubera bidasaba ibintu birebire.
Ariko igitangaje ni uko telefone ifata neza cane aho hantu gusumba ahandi henshi kuri iryo barabara, nk'akarorero i Pennsylvania Wilds.

Amabarabara yagutse, amagorofa y'ibiyo n'amahuriro y'ubudandaji agezweho arangwa n'ibisakazo vy'amategura kama atukura, isoko yo mu kinjana ca 18, n'imisigiti n'amashengero vya kera, n'aho ico gisagara gifise ikirere nk'ica Buraya yo ku kiyaga ca Mediteraneya kuruta ica Tirikiya kama.
Yeruzalemu ifise ibibanza vyinshi vya kera, ibisigaratongo hamwe n'ibice vy'uturanga, vyongeye amahuriro y' ubudandaji yuzuye kandi akora cane, amakawa, hamwe n' uburiro.

Buri mwaka, ingenzi zitari nke zirakomereka kubera zitahagaze aho zari zikwiye guhagarara. Ivyo bikoko ni binini, ni ibinyeshamba kandi birashobora kukugirira nabi, rero vyubahirize uhagarare nka hariya.
Gerageza kumenya ivyo mushoboye nivyo mudashobora kuzana hama muvuge icarico cose kitajanye n' amategeko.
Turkish Airlines ifise ibibanza 39 iguruka ishikiramwo biri mubihugu 30 vyo muri Afirika mumwaka wa 2014.
Ubwo bwato busanzwe bugwana n’ibisasu, buri ku rwego rwa Avenger. Ubwo bwato bwariko buja i Puerto Princesa muri Palawan.
Urunani rw'uguhana amakuru n'ingenzi ni ishirahamwe rihuza ingenzi n'ababa mu bisagara zipfuza kujamwo.
Kubera Ama bus mpuza-burere kenshi aba yuzuye, birahanuwe kugura itike imisi mike imbere.
Kandi nizo zigenda amayira akunzwe gutemberwamwo no kugirwamwo n'amakinga.
Nkuko bikorwa muma Parike y'Igihugu yo muri Afrika y'Epfo yose, hariho ikibuguro co kubungabunga n'ukwinjira iminsi yose yagenewe parike.
Ni ahantu nyaho hari mu kigobe citwa Howe kiri hirya ya Vancouver, hakaba horoshe gushika ufashe tagisi y'ubwato kw'izinga Granville mu gisagara ca Vancouver.

Igisagara kiri neza na neza impande y' amasumo y' amazi, kandi arakwega ingenzi, ariko icokibanza c' iratiro kizwi kiraraha inkerebutsi hamwe n' ingenzi akaryo ko kuhamara umwanya muremure.
Kugira ingendo mu bwato uja Saint Petersburg birimwo no gutembera mu gisagara. Abagendera muri ayo mato ntibasabwa viza (raba amasezerano).
Ariko ivyo uhinduza canke usaba ukwiye kubicisha ku wujejwe ivy'urugendo aho kwitura bene ihoteli ubwabo.
Ubwato bwo kwiyunguruza buratembera amazi ya Galapagos - ufatiye kubunini kuva ku 8 gushika kw'i 100 b'ingenzi.
Mu gihe intumbero y’umuntu yo kuja ahantu ari ukumenya kahise n’umuco n’akaranga vyaho, ubwo bwoko bwo gutembera babwita ugutembera bijanye n’akaranga.

Mumicungararo ya Medina ya kera biroroshe gutora ibibanza bidandanza ibikoresho vy'imico n'akaranga ya Maroke, nk'ama tajini, ibibumbano, ivyamaroke, imbindi, n'ama geegaws atandukanye, mugabo nivyo vyonyene kungenzi.
Ingenzi biba vyaroroheye kumenyera imico n'imigenzo mishasha rimwe na rimwe zishobora kutoroherwa gusubira kumenyera imico n'imigenzo kavukire yazo.
Hafi iminota cumi imbere y'uko isubira kugerageza kwururuka, yaciye iburirwa irengero.
Ekwateri isaba abenegihugu ba Cuban guhabwa ugwete rw' ubutumire imbere yuko binjira muri Ekwateri baciye mubibuga vy' indege mpuza makungu canke aho babemerera kumbibe.

N'aho woba uriko utwara umuduga mw'iryo shamba rikanye ryo ku mutuma w'isi, amasegonda make imiryango yuguruye mu giho uriko urinjira mu muduga ni umwanya ukwiye kugira imibu ibe yinjiranye mu muduga nawe.
Abari kuri ico cuma barahawe amazi mu gihe bari bakirindiririye mu bushuhe bw'amadogere 90(F).
Vyongeye, ico ntigitegerezwa kubatera amakenga, kubera ko ubu ingenzi zihutira kwuzura imiduga.

Kubaho no gukorera ubushake mugihugu c' amahanga ni uburyo bwiza bwo kumenya akaranga gatandukanye, ko guhura n' abantu bashasha, bwo kwiga vyinshi kuri wewe, kubona ibintu gushasha mbere no kuronka ubumenyi bushasha.
Abakora ivy'ingendo kenshi baragirana amasezerano n'amahoteri kanaka. Ariko hari igihe uba ushobora gufatisha ubundi buraro biciye ku muntu akora ivy'ingendo, nk'akarorero aho gushinga ihema.

Ama meri amwamwe yerekana Berlin, m' Ubudagi mu dutabu nyigisho. Nkuko mushobora kubibona kwikarata iri hejuru, Berlin nta nahamwe iri hafi y' ikiyaga kandi n'ukugendera igisagara ntibiri mu giciro c'imeri.
Gufata icumba imbere y'igihe biratuma uwuzofata urugendo atekana kuko aba azi ko atazobura uburaro ashiteyo.
Inkombe z'ibiyaga, ama parike hamwe n’ibibuga vyo kuryama mwo niho hantu hakundwa cane n’abatembera bashaka kunezerwa.
Wipfuza guheba ivyo kworoherwa, umwanya n'ivyo umenyereye kugira uzokoreshe amahera make ashoboka, raba ivyo kugira ingendo za make.
Iyo mufise umwanya w' urugendo wongeweko, suzuma ukuntu ibiciro vyose vyo kuja muri afirika bigereranijwe n' ibiciro vyo kuzunguruka isi.
Abakora ivy'ingendo kenshi baratunganya ivy'icayi, ukwiyunguruza uja canke uva ku kibuga c'indege, canke mbere bagafatanya ivy'urugendo rw'indege n'ivy'amahoteli.
Indege yari igana i Irkutsk ikaba yari itwawe n´ingabo z´indani.
Iyo umuntu atashe mu gihugu ciwe yahora aba mu mahanga, aba yaramaze kumenyera imico n'imigenzo mishasha hanyuma akaba yaramaze gutakaza utumenyero tumwetumwe two mu mico n'imigenzo kavukire.
Ibi bisigura ko mushobora gutemberera ibisagara vy' akahise mumisi mikeya yuzuye mugihe mugaruka kuryama mu bwato mw' ijoro.
Architecture iraba ibijanye n'ugutegura imigero y'inyubakwa no kwubaka. Ingene inyubakwa yubatswe ubwavyo ni ikintu gikunda gukwega ingenzi.
Amashirahamwe y'ivyindege atanga ivyo harimwo Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa ku ngengo ziwa muri Reta Zunze Umwe canke Canada, na WestJet.
Igihe wururutse indege, ubwato canke iyindi ngendeshwa, kenshi ahantu ha mbere ushikira ni ku baraba ivy'imipaka.
Amahoteri amwamwe ni ayo mu gihe hari haharawe amagariyamoshi n'amato njabukabahari ya kera, imbere y'Intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose, mu kinjana ca 19 no mu ntango z'ica 20.
Goma ni igisangara c’ingenzi ca Republika iharanira demokarasi ya Kongo ku ruhande rwa kure mu burasirazuba hafi y’Urwanda.
Ayo ma tegeko acungera urugero rw' abimukira rwatunganijwe hagati y' ibihugu bibiri.
Naho ari hato, haributsa bamwebamwe mu batama bahagendera ingene i Hawayi hari hameze imbere yo kwita leta, hataraza amahoteli manini y'ingenzi n'irindi terambere.
Ukwidagadura gushingiye ku binyabuzima gukwega cane abantu ko boja gutemberea ahari ivyiza kama kugira ngo batembere mu bibanza kama harimwo nibinyabuzima bitandukanye, k'ibikoko n'ibiterwa.
Ku rundi ruhande, mu bihugu vyinshi ibihe vy'ibibarafu canke neje usanga ari ibisanzwe, kandi ni gake abantu bareka kwiyunguruza, umwaka wose.
Ingendo zo kuraba ibikoko bishobora kuba ari co kintu ca mbere kizana ingenzi muri Afrika kandi kikaryohera benshi muri bo.
Ugwinjiriro rwa Angkor rurakenewe kugira winjire m' urusengero, ubwo rero ntiwibagire mureke arengane yawe mugihe mwinjiriye ahagana i Tonle Sap.
Ingenzi zifise umwanya muto vyoba vyiza zimaze umwanya ahandi.
Finland ni ahantu heza ho kwogera mubwato ushaka kwinezereza. "Isi y' ibiyaga igihumbi" irimwo kandi ibihumbi vy' amazinga, mubiyaga hamwe no muma mumazinga akurikirana yo kunkombe.
Barashobora no kuba barakubikiye ikibanza nimba ukeneye umwanya wo kuvyiyumvira canke wo kurondera izindi mpapuro z'urugendo (nk'akarorero viza).
Ivyo bisabwa kenshi bivana n' ibihugu ingenzi yagendeyemwo canke ashaka kugenderamwo.
Ivyo bishobora kuba bibi mu gihe uwuhatembera akwirikiye iyo mirazi, agasesagura inguvu ziwe z'agaciro n'amazi yari asigaye.
Iyo mugiye muma kambi, itwaze udutanda two mukambi canke udutanda tw'umuvuma kugira bibakingire inzoka, utumina hamwe n' ibindi.
Ni urubura rufatanijwe n' utunogo twuzuye kandi turangwa n' amabendera. Hashobora kuzungurukwa n'amatingatibga yabigenewe, bakwega utuduga two k' urubura turimwo ibitoro hamwe n' ivya nkenerwa.
Kuri CafeNet El Sol urashobora gufatisha ikibanza ku madolari 30 y'amanyamerika, canke amadolari 10 uhamara umusi umwe. Ido n'ido ni ku rupapuro rwabo rwa Corcovado.
Muri make, buri mu migwi ibiri: wokora akazi uri ku rugendo, canke ukagerageza kuziganya amahera. Iki kiganiro gishimika kuri ico ca kabiri.
Muriyi ngendeshwa, abantu bose bari ku murongo kandi barashigikiye ukwiyunguruza gushingiye ku modoka zitamenyerewe.
Hari cigwa kijanye no kwiga ingene abashoferi bagenda be no kwiga ingene imodoka zisanzwe zigenda n’ingene zibisanya hagati yazo citwa ivyigwa vy'uruja nuruza.

Mugihe ushobora kudakenera viza kungendo ngufi mubihugu bimwe bimwe nk'ingenzi canke kubikorwa, kugendayo nk' umunyeshure wo muma kungu kenshi bisaba kumarayo umwanya muremure gusumba kujayo nk' ingenzi isanzwe.
Abatemberezi benshi bakunda gutembera kandi bakerebutse bararengewe na gishasha c' ingendo zo mu bihugu biri mwiterambere, aho ukumenyera akaranga kwa hato na hato gushobora kwiyongera vyihuta.
Hariho bisi nkeya kandi zija mu maja ruguru i Hebroni, ikibanza c'akaranga c'amaziko c'abashingantahe bo muri Bibiliya nka Aburahamu, Isaka, Yakobo n'abagore babo.
Uwugendesha ifarasi aguye mugabo ikirenge ciwe cafatiwe muri mwene ako kuma, ifarasi ishobora guca igenda iramuburuta iramutse yirutse. Hari ivyokorwa kugira umuntu yirinde cane iyo mpanuka.
Uca uhabwa urutonde ku rukaratasi canke kuri internet rw'ababa aho hantu bashobora kukwakira, rimwe na rimwe hakaba hariko n'amazina y'abo bakoranye n'ico izindi ngenzi zabavuzeko.

Gashobora kuba akaryo ko kwongereza ubutunzi bugufasha kumara igihe kirekire ahantu, kubera ko ubuzi bwinshi bw'abakorera bushake butanga aho kuba hamwe no gukingirwa hamwe na buke buhemba agashahara gato.
Iyo neje iguye canke igahuhuta, umwuka uri mu muyaga ugacika amazi canke hakirema ibarafu ku madirisha y'umuduga, na ho nyene kubona imbere vyogorana.
Gucumbikisha umuduga wawe bishoboka igihe ufise umuduga munini ufise ibibanza vy'inyuma, insimbabisaka, umuduga w'ubwoko bwa berline canke w'inyuma harehare ufise intebe zizingika.
Imitumba myinshi ifise amabisi mato mato y' Abayapani y'Amakwasteri, usanga ameze neza kandi umuntu yisanzura.
Bisi yabo yaciye ija ahitwa Six Flags St. Louis muri Missouri kugira ngo uwu murwi ukinire ahuzuye abantu.
N'aho biri ukwo, Star Alliance irakwiragira hose uretse mu buseruko bushira ubumanuko bwa bw'ibahari Pasifike kuva i Santiago gushika i Tahiti, narwo akaba ari urugendo rwa LATAM ruhuza isi imwe.
Kw'isi yose, hari amashirahamwe hafi 20 atunganya ivyo kwiruka. Menshi arigenga.
Izinga rya Hong Kong riha izina ryaryo ubutaka bwa Hong Kong kandi ni ikibanza ingenzi nyinshi zifata nk'intumbero nyamukuru.
Ugishika mu mahanga, abantu bashobora kuba barakwihanganira bakanagutahura kubera bazi ko ingenzi ziba zitaramenyera ico gihugu gishasha.
Ijambo safari rirakunda gukoreshwa bashaka kuvuga ingendo zo hasi zo kuraba ibikoko bitangaje vyo muri Afrika, canecane mw'ishamba ry'umukenke.
Iyo mwururutse ubwato mukoresheje ingendo shuri gusa ntimuzoba mukeneye viza itandukanye (guhera 2009).
Amahoteli yitwa auberges kenshi aha indaro abakiri bato, canecane abafise imyaka iri hagati ya mirongibiri na mirongitatu. Mugabo kenshi urahasanga n'abakuze.
Iyo muri mubiruhuko, muba mufise umwanya wo kwinezereza hamwe nogufata iyi minota yo guteka ikintu kidasanzwe.
Abantu benshi baribikira ibibanza imbere neza y' igihe (kuberako amato aba yuzuye mugihe ca benshi).
Amakamyo atagikoreshwa ni yo bikozeko mu kuzibira ubwinjiriro bw'inzira za gariyamoshi zica mu kuzimu kandi hari abapolisi 80 basaba abatwara imodoka guca mu zindi nzira.
Igihe c'ingenzi mu mahuriro yo mu misozi mu bisanzwe gishika kw'isonga mu gihe c'ici ry'Abahindi.
Uburyo bworoshe cane bwo gutangura mw'icuruzwa ry'inyandiko zerekeye ingendo ni ukwerekana ubuhinga bwanyu ku rukuta ngurukana bumenyi rwerekeye ingendo rusanzwe ruhari.
Rimwerimwe ingendo zo mu kirere z'ubuhinga zirinjira i musozi, mu ntumbero yo gukora imyimenyerezo yo kuduga imisozi canke kugira bashike kw’isonga ry’isi, iryo na ryo rikaba rifise icicariro kinini.
Uwo wese ategekanya kuja mu gihugu gishobora kubonwa nk'ikirimwo intambara akwiye gutegurwa n'abahinga bavyo.
Ibi bitanga akaryo keza ko kubona aurores boréales, kuko ikirere kizoba cijimye cane canke bukebuke ugereranije n'isaha.
Kuberako isuzumwa ry' inyambukira ridahari canke vyo guhuma amaso iyo mushitse mugihugu canyu c' amavuko, isuzumwa kuri customs rishobora kuba ikibazo.
Nta guteba gutewe n'imiduga myinshi kwavuzwe ko kwabaye mw'ibarabara rizigura abo mu gisagara bashobora kwikorako.
Iyo mutemberereye i Greenland mubihe vy' ubukonje (ariko iyo uduze m' uburaruko, niko hakanya), ni vyiza kwitwaza impuzu zishusha bikwiye.

Amasanamu atagira ibara yerekana ko ryoba ar’isenga dufatiye kw’itandukaniro ry’ubushuhe yaba mw’ijoro canke ku murango.
Mu bisanzwe, impene zashirwa mu bundi busho bw’ibitungwa hanyuma zigashigwa mu misozi, ahari ubwatsi butotahaye. Kenshi zaragirwa n’abana kandi no muri ino minsi, ubwo buryo bwo kuzitunga buracariho.
Mosasorusi yari inyamaswa ya mbere ikomeye mu gihe cayo, rero nta co yatinya, kiretse bigenzi vyayo.
Ibikoko vyose vyashitse kuri rino zinga ubwambere vyaje hano haba mu kwoga, kuguruka canke kureremba.
Abantu ba kera batanguye kuzitunga kugira ngo baronke vyoroshe amata, ubwoya, inyama n’inkoba.
Uyu munsi, udukoko twonyene tudashobora kubika amababa kumubiri ni umugarye hamwe n’umunzerere.
Igihe abantu batabona ko izo mpongo zishobora kubagirira nabi, barashobora kuzegera cane bakishira mu kaga.
Rifise urucangacange ruboneka runini rw´ubwoko bw´ibiterwa, bitewe n´ubwinshi bw´uturere dutoduto, amasi atandukanye hamwe n´uburebure buhindagurika.

Ugutambuka ku maguru abiri vyarabonetse ku bantu ba Australopithecus haheze imyaka miriyoni 4.2-3.9, naho abantu ba Sahelanthropus bashobora kuba baratambutse bakoresheje amaguru abiri nko mu myaka miriyoni indwi iheze.
Zifise amaguru ariko ibigaragamba n’inzara, zirata amagi kandi zigira kumaguru abiri nka T-Rex.
Naho hariho ibikoko vyitwa requins, ni gake bitera abantu. Vyinshi biratinya abantu bigaca vyigira.
Ku nkengera z'ibibura binini ibimanyu binini birameneka bikavako, bikarwa hasi binabaye ibishoboka bigakoroka canke bigatembagarira kure y'inkengera.
Ibikoko vyinshi vyo mu mahanga usanga bitoroshe kubona, kandi hari igihe amaparike usanga afise amategeko ajanye no gufata amafoto yo guca amahera.

Imiyaga ikaze, urubura, imvura irenze urugero n'imiriro ya nyakanga ni bimwe mu biranga ikirere giteye akaga bikaba n'ingaruka zaco, cokimwe n'imvura z'ibihuhusi, inkuruma, agashururu ko mu mazi n'ibivumbuzi.
Iyi nyoni yuzuye amababa, y´amaraso ashushe irya izindi vyari vyibazwa ko yahoze itambuka ihagaze ku maguru abiri n´ibizara nk´ivya Velociraptor.
Mw'ishamba rya savane, biragoye ko inkende ifise ivyo mu nda bisa nk'ibi vy'abantu yohaza ivyunyunyu ikenera biturutse ku biterwa biba bihari.
Ibikoko nivyo gusa bifise ubwonko(naho ibikoko vyose bitabufise; jellyfish, nk’akarorero ntabwonko zifise).
Urwara rugira kabiri rwari runini, bitanga ukuduga kw´izina Hesperonychus risigura "urwara rwo mu burengero."
Abantu ni vyo biremwa vya mbere bizi gutahura ibiri mu bwenge bw'ibindi.
Kuri izo nkengera nka zose hari umusenyi, ukwoga nta kaga birimwo, kandi henshi hari igitutu gitangwa n’ibiti vyitwa pohutukawa.
Imisozi ya Peninsula itangurira ngaha mu mirwa, hama ikagaragara kugira yubake urukurikirane rw' ibiro metero 360 rw' Imisozi Ellsworth, iciyemwo kabiri n' urubura rwa Minnesota.
Ivyo biduha uburyo bwinshi bwo gushobora kwinyegeza abansi batwo.
Igikoko citwa bison, impongo yitwa wapiti, iyitwa élan, idubu n'ibindi bikoko binini nka vyose, birashobora kukugirira nabi naho womengo biratekereje.
Igihe c' ubukonje gishobora kubabesha ko kiryoshe: Ubushuhe buja gake munsi yo kuba urubura, ariko umuyaga ukanye urihuza bigatera kwumva hakanye gusumba uko igipimo c'ubushuhe gitanga.
Ibivumbuzi bifise umuyaga ugenda ku bilometero 480 kw’isaha (133 m/s; 300 mph).
Benshi mu bashakashatsi bajejwe kwiga ibjanye na kahise k’abantu n’akibikoko bemeza ko bimwe mu bikoko vyitwa dinozoro vyoba bikiriho. Ubu tuzita inyoni.
Gusa iyo sellile zikuru z'umuntu zihindutse, zirashobora kwandukira no ku bana uwo muntu azovyara, mu gihe ihinduka ryo kubindi bice rishobora gutuma umuntu apfa canke bigatera kanseri.
Ukuboko kw'umuntu ni kugufi kuruta ikirenge, n'amagufa yo mu kiganza agoroye.
Intambwe, ingwe zitwa guépards n'izitwa léopards hari igihe bigira udusoni. Wobibona neza ukoresheje amatarubindi.
Kubera ko ata mashamba manini yari ahari mu gihugu ca Kanani, inkwi zari zizimvye rwose.

Ibihumeka bidakunze kuboneka nk´idubu risa n´inombe ry´i Buraya, ibingira, inkona, igihuna, ingwe y´icuya, ibiyabu vyo mw´ishamba n´umusambi ishobora kubonekayo, co kimwe n´ubundi bwoko bwinshi bumenyerewe.
Ibirori vy’ukwidagadura, navyo, biri mw’ihimiriza ryakozwe n’igisagra ca Bucharest gishaka kwerekana ishusho nziza y’umurwa mukuru wa Rumaniya, nk’igihugu ciyumvira kandi kirimwo ibintu bitandukanye.
Umugwi waburijemwo ikirori ku Kibuga citiriwe Kwibuka Intambara y´aba Maui, ico cari kwitabirwa n´abantu 9,000, kandi basaba imbabazi abakunzi.
Umu diva turque Sezen Aksu yaciye aririmba ijwi ryagatatu hamwe numu taliyano Alessandro Safina hamwe n'umuririmvyi w'umugiriki Haris Alexiou.

Amatike menshi agurishirijwe k'umurongo ngurukanabumenyi hakoreshejwe imbuga ngurukana bumenyi zo kugurisha icamunara nka eBay canke Craigslist aba ari itike za parike z'iminsi myinshi zakoreshejwe igice.
Gosling yararaswe ngo ahiganwe mu bakinyi ba sinema barushije abandi, Stone na we mu bakinyi b'igitsina-gore.
Bahagaritse ibiteramo vyabo inyuma y'aho umuririmvyi mukuru Steven Tyler akomerekeye igihe yagwa avuye kuri podiyumu yariko aririmbirako, kw'itariki 5 Myandagaro.
Ubugeni bw'abakundana bwabereye i Texas umwaka urarangiye baciye baza i Buffalo kugira umusi mukuru barikumwe n'abagenzi n'abaryango.
Hanyuma, Lakkha Singh yafashe iya mbere mu kuririmba izo ndirimbo z'Imana.
Ku bijanye n'amasabukuru amwamwe, benshi cane mu bitaba amasabukuru y'umuziki bashima gucumbika ahabera ibirori, kandi benshi babona ko kubikora bihambaye.
Hari uburiro butari buke bukikuje umurima, hama inyuma y' umuhingamo no k' umugoroba, ibiteramo vya gusa vyama bikorwa guhera kuri gazebo yo hagati.
Igihe kinini c'ayo masabukuru y'urusengero kiba gihuye n'isabukuru ya nya rusengero canke ivuka ry'ikimana nyamukuru caho canke ikindi kintu gihambaye kijanye n'urwo rusengero.
Benshi mu banditsi babo, bagiye baragira uruhara runini mu biganiro vy'amakuru atwenza akorwa na Jon Stewart na Stephen Colbert.
Abaririmvyi rurangiranwa bo hirya no hino mu gihugu bararirmvye za «bhajans», indirimbo z'Imana, bari imbere y'ibirenge vya Shri Shyam.
Lakkha Singh na we yarashikirije «chhappan bhog bhajan». Umuririmvyi Raju Khandelwal yari amuherekeje.
Ayo mahoteli ni yo abatunzi n'abantu rurangiranwa b'ico gihe bashikiramwo, kenshi bakaronka imfungurwa nziza cane n'ibirori vy'ijoro.
Hari imivinyu myinshi yo mu Bufaransa iboneka, mugabo iyo muri Nouvelle Zélande na Ositaraliya ni yo wosanga itononekara kubera ingendo.

Kera cane, imbere y’ikiganiro Daily Show na Raporo ya Colbert, Heck na Johnson bariyumviriye igitabo casigura ibijanye n’amakuru - ndetse no kumenyesha amakuru - igihe bari abanyeshuri muri kaminuza y'ahitwa Wisconsin mu 1988.

Ku musi wa kane, mu kiganiro nyamukuru c'Iyahanishwa ry'i Tokyo ry'udukino tw'ubuhinga bwa none, umukuru w'ishirahamwe Nintendo, Satora Iwata, yarahishuye agatelekomande kazokoreshwa mu gukoresha icuma citwa Nintendo Revolution gishasha casohowe n'iryo shirahamwe.
Ishirahamwe ry´abashinzwe uwo mugwi, HK Management Inc., nta mvo zabiteye batanze aho baburizamwo ku wa 20 Nyakanga, ariko bataye ikosa ku mwo z´uburyo umunsi wakwirikiye.
Twinshi mu dukoni nk'utwo tuboneka muri Ositaraliya ntitugaruka uduteye. Abagitangura kwiga vyiza bokwirinda kugatera iyo hari umuyaga.
Mu 2017, Siminoff yarabonetse ku mboneshakure ihayanisha ibidandazwa yitwa QVC.
Amahimbazwa yatangujwe n'igiteramo c'agakura c'umurwi uzwi kw'isi nzima Cirque du Soleil.
Iyo muba mugisagara aho aho akaranga ko kunwa inzoga gahindagurika, gende mu bunywero canke mumazu rusangi yagizwe ububare yo mu birwati mudasanzwe mujamwo.
Amasabukuru y'urusengero rwa Kerala araryoshe kuraba, ukama ubona inzovu zasharijwe zirengana, umugwi w'abacuraranzi b'urusengero, n'ibindi birori.
Urwo rukino rushingiye ku ntambara ya kabiri y'i Fallujah, intambara ikaze hagati y'ingabo z'Abanyamerika n'iza Iraki.
Wibuke ko naho igiteramo kiba caheze, hashobora kuba abantu bitavye uwo musi mukuru babandanya kuvuza umuziki gushika ijoro ryitereye.
San Francisco ni kandi kimwe mu bibanza vyiza mugihugu kukundi guteka kwo muri Aziya: kwo muri Koreya, kwo muri Thai, kwo Mubuhinde, no Mubuyapani.
Mukurangiza, umugwi w'intambo wa turukiya Fire of Anatolia waciye werekana "Troy".
Inzoga nyamukuru yaho yitwa 'Number One', inzoga idahanitse, yamara iryoshe kandi imara inyota. Iyindi nzoga yaho yitwa "Manta".
Benshi muri twebwe birahika tukarorera ikiganiro co ku mboneshakure kitumenyesha ubuhinga kanaka canke ikintu cabaye tutazopfa tugizemwo uruhara canke ngo dukoreshemwo ubwo bumenyi.

Ikarita ya posita yiwe igira 1,000 yari ca gitangaza "Ibikorwa Vyiza vy'Abami b'Ubuswede" ya David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl mu 2000, yagiye ku ntonde z'igitabo c'ibikorwa vy'akataraboneka kw'Isi ca Guinness.

Iki gisagara kizoba kibaye icambere kiri mu bumanuko bw’uburayi cakiriye “ukwiyereka kw’inka”, igikorwa cambere kw’isi gikoranya abakora utugenenegene kw’isi, hagati ya Ruheshi na Myandagaro, uno mwaka.
Aha ni igihe abantu baja ahantu hatandukanye n’ubuzima bwabo bwa minsi yose kugirango baruhuke kandi baryoherwe.

John Grant wo muri WNED Buffalo (aho ikiganiro Reading Rainbow catanguriye) yavuze ati: "Ikiganiro Reading Rainbow carigishije abana igituma bosoma,... kibakundisha gusoma — kiremesha abana gutora igitabu bagasoma."
Yakurikiwe na Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, umugwi wa Janissary, hamwe n'abaririmvyi Fatih Erkoç na Müslüm Gürses.
Kubera ukuntu ibigwati vy'Abanyamerika b'imvukira biri kure, ntuzoronka aho wisamariza neza mw'ijoro utagiye i Albuquerque canke i Santa Fe.

Urwego ACMA kandi rwasanze ko n'aho iyo videwo yerekanwe ku Rubuga, Musaza Mukuru ntiyahonyanze amategeko agenga igenzura ry'ibiri ku murongo kuko amakuru ntiyigeze abikwa ku rubuga rwa Musaza Mukuru.
Nimba umaze kuraba isinema yitwa National Treasure, ushobora kwiyumvira ko hari ikarata y'ahanyegejwe itunga yanditswe inyuma y'urwandiko rw'Itangazo ry'ukwikukira.
Uwusohora inkino Konami yamenyesheje uno musi mu kinyamakuru c'abayapani ko batazosohora urukino rwitwa Six Days i Fallujah.
Naho umugwi w’amazinga yo hafi y'inkengera hamwe n’ibiyaga binini vyagutse ku buryo vyokwakira ubwato ubwo ari bwo bwose, ubwato butobuto canke ubwitwa kayake butuma wiyumva ukundi.
Amahayanishwa mpuzamakungu y'ivy'ubusitani ni ibirori bidasanzwe aho berekana amashurwe, imirima y'abahinga n'ibindi vyose bijanye n'ibiterwa.
Ibirango vyamanitswe kuma piramide kandi ama piramide atandukanye aramurikiwe.
Mu minsi yaco yambere, iki kiganiro cabonetse gusa ku rubuga rumaze igihe rukora kuri radiyo TogiNet, uru rubuga rugizwe cane cane n'ibiganiro vyo kwi radiyo.
Uguhimbarirwa amashurwe y'iserasi kwa Cherry Blossom, kuzwi nka hanami, kwamye ari kimwe kimwe mu bigize akaranga k'Abayapani kuva mu kinjana ca 8.
N'aho Winfrey yari yiyuha iryosozi mu gusezera, yareretse neza abakunzi biwe ko azogaruka.
Nimwuzuze inzu yanyu ikawa mugatondo hamwe n' icayi kiruhura kiva mumashurwe ya kamomiye mw'ijoro.

Iyo sinema yararaswe ngo ihiganwe mu bijanye no kuba iy'agaheta no mu bijanye n'ubuyobozi, ugutunganya isinema, ivyambarwa, ugutunganya neza amasanamu, ubudasa bw'umuziki wakoreshejwe, ugutunganya ikiniro, ugutosora amajwi, ukuyanywanisha, n'ukwigana inkuru ata ho uyikuye.
Rimwe na rimwe usanga hagenderwa cane n’imiryango hakaba hariho n’utubutike dutandukanye dutonze ku nkengera. Kwoga mu mazi nta ngorane bitera.

N'aho biri ukwo, bifise ubwoko butandukanye bw'ubwiza n'ubushuhe mu gihe c'ubukanye, harimwo na henshi muri ivyo bibanza vyo ku musozi haboneka urubura rwinshi hakuguruwa n'ibikorwa nk'ivyo kunyerera ku rubura.
Uwo mugwi w'umuziki wa rock wabwirizwa kuzunguruka Amerika na Kanada gushitsa igenekerezo rya 16 Nyakanga.
Mu myaka ya za 1980 yakoze ku bikino nka Taxi, Cheers, nikindi citwa The Tracy Ullman.
Bifata nk'igice c'isaha kugira utembere ico kigwati gitangaje.
Ijwi hamwe n' umuco bikorerwa kuri piramide ni kimwe mubintu binezereza cane mu karere ku bana.
Ushaka kumenya ingene batera ako gakoni kagenda kakakugaruka mu kuboko kwawe, raba neza ko ufise agakoni kabishoboye.
Inkuru yatanzwe muri opera y’Abafaransa, yanditswe na Camille Saint-Saens, ni iy'umunyatugenegene "ubuzima bwiwe bugizwe no gukunda ibiyayuramutwe no gukunda Ubuyapani."
Iyo sinema yarimwo Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone yararaswe mu zotorwa, mu mice yose ihambaye.

Mu bisanzwe kazino nta ko zitagira ngo zungukire cane ku mwanya abajayo bahamara no ku mahera yabo. Kenshi usanga ata madirisha canke amasaha yo ku ruhome bihari, n'imiryango isohoka ikaba igoye gutora.
Muri iki kiganiro, habonetsemwo cane amajwi y'abakinyi basanzwe bataragera kure baba Texas yo mubuseruko.
Nyinshi mu nsengero zaho ziragira Isabukuru itangura muri Munyonyo ikarangira hagati muri Rusama, bikavana n'ikirangamisi c'umwaka ca buri rusengero.
Mu mugwi w’amazinga no mu biyaga, ntibikenewe cane gukoresha ubwato bunini.
Kubera iyo mvo, abaririmvyi baranywa urumogi bariko bararirimba, kandi ibiteramo birahimiriza abavyitavye kubikora.
Umugwi wa Aerosmith wahagaritse ibiteramo vyabo vyari bisigaye mu rugendo rwabo.
Ushaka rero kwibera hafi y'aho ibirori bibera, utegerezwa kuhashika kare ukaba urarondera ikibanza co gucumbikamwo hafi y'umuziki.
Mu myaka n'iyindi, hari ingero nyinshi zitandukanye za filime zagiye zirakoreshwa. Iza mm 35 (negatife za mm 36 kuri 24) ni zo zimenyerewe cane.
Naho iki ari igikorwa kimenyerwe cane, kirabujijwe na Disney: amatike ntashobora guhanahanwa.
Agace kose k’ikiganiro kashimikira ku mutwe w’ijambo mu gitabo kanaka maze kagaca irya n'ino uwo mutwe biciye mu nkuru nyinshi.
Mu bibanza bitandukanye vy'aho i Roma, harashizwe imboneshakure zifasha abantu kurorera ivyo birori.
Sophocle na Aristophane baracari abanditsi b'ibikino bemerwa cane kandi ibikino banditse biri mu gitigiri c'ivyandikano vyemerwa kuruta ibindi vyose kw'isi.
Ikiganiro cose caratanga ivyerekeye ibitabo abana borondera igihe bagiye mu bibanza basomeramwo ibitabo.
Kugira inota rivuge cane ku kinanda, ukoresha igisaho caco n'inguvu canke unyarutsa.
Murashobora kubona ama piramide mu mwijima kandi murashobora no kuyabona mugacerere imbere yuko igiteramo gitangura.
Umuntu yagiye kwidagadura arshobora guhiga, kuroba, gufata amafoto y’inyoni, kuga ahari ibikoko no kwiga kubijanye n’ibinyabuzima.
I Sphinx ikoreshwa nk' igitambara hamwe n'idondora ry'inkuru ndende.
Usanga kenshi hari imfungurwa, ibinyobwa n'ibikino bidasanzwe kugira abahagendera babandanye kuryoherwa, bahagume.

Hamaze kwerekanwa ibiganiro mucongereza no mukiyapani, ibihugu vyishize hamwe kwisi vyatanguje iyindi migambi muki espanyole, igitaliano n'igikoreya, kumboneshakure, k'ubuhinga ngurukana bumenyi hamwe no kubikoresho ngendanwa.
Imbere y'igikino “Simpsons”, Simon yari yarakoreye kubindi bikino vyinshi ugutandukanye.
Ivyo bizofasha abakinyi gukina no guhindura ikibanza c'amashusho yo mu dukino twa videwo uko bagomba, mu kuza barajana iyo terekomande iyo bashaka mu kirere.
Nimiburiburi abantu 100 bari baje mumusi mukuru, mu ntumbero y'uguhimbaza isabukuru yambere y'abakundana bagize ubugeni bwabo mumwaka uheze.

Hari indirimbo zibiri zo muri iyo sinema zahiganishijwe mu ndirimbo nshasha zaruse izindi: iyitwa Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na City of Stars. Uruganda rw'amasinema rwitwa Lionsgate rwaraswe incuro 26, rurusha izindi nganda zose.
Antaragitica ni igice c’isi ca mbere gikanye, kikaba gikikuje isonga ryo mu bumanuko ry’isi.
Ama Sundarbans n' umusipi munini wama mangrove kw' isi, agera kubirometero 80 (50 mi) mugihugu ca Bangladeshi n'Ubuhindi inyuma y'igihugu uvuye k' urubibe.
Ibigendajuru, ivyapima vyose hamwe pawundi 1.000, bikangendera ku murindi wababa mayiri 17.500 kw’isaha, vyarasekanye ku mayiri 491 hejuru y’Isi.
Inkengera z'ikiyaga za North Shore (mu karere ka North Harbour) ziherereye kw’ibahari Pasifike, hakaba hatangurira i Long Bay mu buraruko gushika i Devonport mu bumanuko.
Amazinga matomato nka yose ni ibihugu vyigenga, canke ateranije n'Ubufaransa, kandi azwi nk'ibibanza vyo kumucanga bizimvye cane.
Uruzi runini rwa Amazon rupima ibilometero 6.387 (mayile 3.980). Rwegeranya amaza ava mu zindi nzuzi ibihumbi.
Ikiyaga ca Onega naco kirafatanye na Volga, kubwivyo kuva Kukiyaga Caspian uciye m' Uburusiya biracashoboka.
Abashakashatsi basanze ku buringanire bw'ukwezi hari ubusumbasumbane bwitwa «escarpements lobés» busa n'ubwatewe n'ukugabanuka kw'ukwezi kuba buhorobuhoro.
Hashobora kuba ama mariya menshi ku ruhande rwo hafi kuko croute yonze. Biba vyoroshe ko ikurnga kiduga kikaja hejuru.
15 yo muri ayo mabuye yitirirwa imvura ya meteorite yo muri mukakaro iheze.

Glen Cushing wo mu kigo ca Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika gishinzwe ubushakashatsi ku bumenyi bw'ikirere hamwe na kaminuza ya Arizona yo mu buraruko iri ahitwa flagstaff, muri Arizona, yagize ati: "Ubushuhe bwayo masenga ntibumeze nk’ayayandi masenga manini manini ari kw’isi asanzwe agira ubushushe busanzwe, ariko arasangiye ic’uko vyose ari imyobo minini yimvye mwisi."
Amazinga ya Cook ntagira ibisagara binini, ahubwo agizwe n'amazinga 15. Makuru ni Rarotonga na Aitutaki.
Utundi turere tunini cane two hirya mu buraruko tubamwo abantu bakebake, kandi hamwehamwe usanga ari agahinga ka nyaganande.
Ivyo biyaya kenshi bavyita "vidde" bisiguye ikibanza cagutse, cugurutse kitagiramwo ibiti, c'ubwaguke butagira imbibe.
Ibice 20% vy’amazi ava mu nzuzi aja mu biyaga ava mu ruzi Amazon.
Ibintu bijanye na nyamugigima vyatumye haba ikiringo c'ihinduka vyabaye ku wa 10 Ntwarante ku ruhande rwo mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw'umunwa w'isonga ry'uwo musozi w'ibirunga.
Umuhora White Sea–Baltic uhuza Inyanja ya Arctic Kukiyaga ca Baltic, iciye Kukiyaga Onega, ikiyaga Ladoga na Saint Petersburg, kenshi cane hakoreshejwe inzuzi n' ibiyaga.
Ottawa ni wo murwa mukuru umeze neza wa Kanada. Havugwa indimi zibiri nyamukuru, hakaba n'amaratiro atari make y'utugenegene yerekana kahise ka Kanada n'ivy'ubu.
Ama Sundarbans afutse uburinganire bw' ibirometero kwadarato 3850, muriyo ica gatatu gifutswe n'ibice vy' amazi/ibenga.
Imvura yaguye ikagera kuri puse 6.34 ku gipimo c'i Oahu, vyavuzwe ko yagize "akamaro".
Igihe kimwe cahoze ari igisagara ca kera ca Smyrna, ubu ni ihuriro rya kijambere, riteye imbere kandi nyabagendwa mu budandanji, ryubakiye ku nkikuro z'amazi menshi rikikijwe n'imisozi.
Amazone kandi ni uruzi rwagutse kw’isi, rimwe na rimwe ubwaguke bwa mayile zitandatu.
Abashakashatsi ba National Hurricane Center bategekanya ko Daniella kizokwikusaniriza mu gihuhusi kuwagatatu.
Muburaruko intara ikikijwe na Sahara, hama mubumanuko no muburengero n'Ikiyaga ca Atlantic.
Tirikiya ikikujwe n'ibiyaga impande zitatu: Ikiyaga Égée mu burengero, Ikiyaga c'Umunyu mu buraruko, n'Ikiyaga Mediterane mu bumanuko.
Urubura ntiruguma hamwe, ariko ruguma runyerera ruja mu ntaba z'umusozi. Ibi bizotuma haba imigaga, ibinogo, bishobora kuzibirwa n'ibiraro vy'ibibura.
Uretse ibikoresho bitatu ngirakamaro vy'ubushakashatsi, ico cuma kigira ubushakashatsi ku kwezi cari gifise n'ishusho y'ibendera ry'Ubuhindi ishushanije ku mpande zose.

Uwahoze ari umunyeshure yavuze ko yakoresha amajambo y'akagwi mw'ishure, akigisha ubuhinga bwo kuresha munyandiko eka yari nk'umugenzi w'abanyeshure.
Ivyo turabibona dufatiye ku vyo tumenyereye ubu mu bijanye no kwitunganiriza ibintu hamwe n'ibiganiro vyo ku mboneshakure biduha amakuru, bikaducisha ubwenge.
Bituma abanyeshure bashobora gukora ibintu ku muvuduko wabo, bakiga amakuru ku muvuduko bipfuza.
Abakozi bategerezwa kenshi kuronka uruhusha rw'ababakurira ku ngingo iyo ari yo yose bafata, kandi vyitezwe ko bubaha amategeko y'ababakurira ata guhigimanga.
Kwiga muri ubwo buryo bwitwa "post-modernisme" bituma yikuramwo ivyitwa ko ari ntabanduka. Nta buryo bumwe gusa bwo kwiga bubaho.

Karno n'umwigisha w'icongereza azwi neza ariko atavugwako rumwe yigishije muburyo bwa "Modern Education and King's Glory" yigamvye kuba afise abanyeshure ibihumbi icenda mugihe akazi kiwe kari gahurumbirwa.

Gukoresha neza imbuga za blogs "birashobora gutuma barushiriza kuba abantu bihweza kandi badapfa kwemera ibintu; mu gutanga ivyiyumviro ku vyo babonye kuri Internet, abanyeshure barashobora kwerekana aho bahagaze ku vyo abandi banditse no ku bindi bibazo kanaka (Oravec, 2002).
Izi mbuga ngurukanabumenyi zirakurikirwa cane, na canecane mu gisata c’indero.
Liggins yahonyoye mumakanda yase aca yinjira mugisata c'ubuvuzi.

Imbuga zitwa blogs na zo nyeneye zirashobora gufasha abanyeshure kuryohora ubuhinga bwo kwandika. Naho mu ntango abanyeshure kenshi batangura kwandika kuri izo mbuga ata kwubahiriza neza indimburo n'inyandiko y'amajambo, kuba izo mbuga zijako n'abandi bituma kenshi baryohora.
Ukunywana n'Imana ni ukugerageza kwiyeregeza ikibirengeye, ikimana, ukuri kw'ivy'impwemu canke Imana, kuyiyumvamwo canke kuyitahura.
Mu kiringo kirenga imyaka igihumbi, idini rya Gikirisu ryaratumye ibihugu vya Buraya vyunga ubumwe naho bitari bisangiye ururimi n’imico.
Na Yoga ya Kundalini inkomezi za Kundalini (inkomezi zo kubonekerwa) ziravyuka biciye mu nyifato za yoga, imyimenyerezo yo guhema, ama mantras hamwe n'amashusho.
Abantu barashikanira izo mana, abaherezi na bo bakagerageza kwitaho ivyo izo mana zikeneye biciye ku birori n'imisi mikuru.
Chambers, atemera Imana neza, avuga ko ibirego vyiwe "bitwengeje" kandi ko "umuntu ashobora kwitwarira umuntu uwo ari we wese."
Ico gihe, kwibuka ingene imbere y'aho berekanye ishaka mu vyo gutunganya imigambi hamwe n'ivyiza vyavuyemwo, vyatumye abantu bitegurira kwakira amahinduka n'uburongozi bushasha ku bw'ishengero ryaho.
Myinshi mu migirwa ikikuje uwo musi mukuru yaramaze mbere no kwakirwa n'abatemera mu bihugu vy'Abakristu n'ibitari ivy'Abakristu hirya no hino kw'isi.
Kubera insiguro y'amadini y'igisagara, hamwe na cane cane ubwinshi bw' ibibanza Bishaje vy' Igisagara, Yeruzalemu ni hamwe mubibanza bikuru vy' ingenzi vya Isirayeli.
Sikhisme n'idini ryo m'Ubuhindi bwo mu bumanuko. Ryakomotse mu karere ka Punjab mu kinjana ca 15 bitewe n'ukwiyonkora kw'imihari kwo mu migenzo y'Aba Hindu.
Mu butungane, Chambers yagirije Imana "kwica, gusambura no kwica yabiteguye ama miliyoni y’abantu baba kw’isi."
Idini rikuru muri Moldova ni Abakristu b'Aba Ortodogisi.
Mu mategeko y'aba Bouddha yo muri Tibet iroroshe cane. Igizwe na Yoga ya Kundalini, ugutekana ukiyumwira n'inzira y'urukundo rwemera vyose.
Muhamadi yarazirikana cane ibintu birengeye ivyo ng'aha kw'isi. Yarakunda kuja mw'isenga ryahavuye ryitwa “Hira‘” ku Musozi wa “Noor” (umuco) agiye kuzirikana.

Brezile nico gihugu kinini gusumba ibindi ca Katolika y'Abaromani kw'Isi, kandi Ishengero ya Katolika y'Abaromani ryamye na ntaryo ryiyamiriza iyemerwa mu mategeko ry'ubugeni ku basangiye ibitsina mu gihugu.
Ivy'aba Bouddha bo muri Tibet bishingiye ku nyigisho za Buddha, ariko vyakwiragijwe n'inzira yitwa iya mahayana y'urukundo n'ubundi buhinga bwinshi bwo muri Yoga y'Abahindi.
Buri muntu arashobora kuronka ukubonekerwa. Ikintu kimwe gusa kizibiye inzira zo gushika kuri iki cipfuzo ni imivurugano iturimwo n'ukubona ibintu nabi.
Alegizandere amaze kuba umwami yaripfuje gusanura urwo rusengero, baramwankira. Rwahavuye rusanurwa mu 323 M.K. amaze gupfa.

Aba Sikhs bita ishengero ryabo Gurmat, n'igi Punjab gisigura ngo "inzira y'umwigisha mukuru". Umwigisha mukuru ni ngombwa bidasanzwe mu madini yose y'Abahindi ariko muri Sikhisme agira akamaro kagena imizi y'ukwemera kw'aba Sikhs.

Ihuriro ry'ibikorwa vyo kwicara ukiyumwira ryo muri Tibet ni Ikigirwamana ca Yoga. Biciye mu mashusho afasha kubonera mu vyiyumviro ibigirwamana bitandukanye aho inguvu zibonekera haruguruka, ivyitwa chakra bikuguruka hama ukubonekerwa kukabaho.
Iyo nyubakwa yabamwo ingenzi nyinshi zaje gutembera muri ico gisagara ceranda buca bagira urugendo rweranda rwitwa «hajj».
Mu gihe batemberera mu ivyo bigo vy´abihebeye Imana, abagore basabwa kwambara amajipo afuka amavi no gufuka ibitugu vyabo navyo nyene.
Zimwe muri izo nsengero wasanga zubatseko iminara yitwa ziggourats ifise imero ya piramide.
Abafurera bamwebamwe b'Abadagi baratanguje inyandiko y'ikinya-esitoniya kugira bafashe imvukira zaho kurushiriza kumenya Imana.
Abahinga mubijanye na kamere n’imibereho yabantu bisunze cane inyandiko za kera, cane cane Bibiliya yari mu kilatini.
Muri ico gihe ca kahise k'Uburayi, ishengero rya Gatolika, rimaze gutunga no kugira ububasha, ryaragizweko amatohoza.
Abarabu kandi bazanye Isiramu kumasi, hama yatwaye igice kinini muri Comoros na Mayotte.
Aba Sikhs bafata nk'aho ukwemera kwabo ari idini ritandukanye n'irya Hinduisme n'aho babizi neza ko gufise imizi n'imigenzo ya gi Hindu.
Hejuru kuri nya munara haba ari ikibanza ceranda gihariwe iyo mana.
Abanyababiloni barubakira imwe yose mu mana zabo urusengero nyamukuru, bikitwa ko ari ho itaha.

Amadini menshi ya kera akunze guhimbaza Umusi wo Kwibuka Izuka wa Pasika kuwagatandatu mw'ijoro muri mpera y'indwi yanuma ya Pasika, n'imiryango y'abihebeye Imana kenshi ikavyinjiramwo mu gicugu hagati kugira bahimbaze izuka rya Yesu.
Urusengero rwose rwaba rufise ikigo ca bose hamwe n'ikibanza ceranda c'indani cinjiramwo abaherezi gusa.
Uwemera aba arondera ukubibabamwo, ugutahura, canke ubumenyi mu kuri ku bijanye n´Imana/ ikigirwamana canke ibigirwamana.
Noheli ni umwe mu misi mikuru ihambaye y'Abakristu, kandi ihimbazwa nk'ivuka rya yezu.
Igisagara ni ceranda kuma dini atatu yemera Imana imwe - Abayuda, aba Kristu, aba Isilamu, kandi kikaba ihuriro ry' ukwemera, amadini hamwe n' akaranga.
Iryo senga riracariho kandi uriravye urabona neza ko Muhamadi yakunda kuzirikana ivy'Imana.
Ikigwati ca Haldarsvík gitanga ishusho kw'izinga rya hafi rya Eysturoy kandi kikagira ishengero ritamenyerewe rifise ry'impande umunani.
